title: Chica the Chicken

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, distract a player with pizza

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Distracting a player with Pizza will make them learn the names of all non-astral visitors at night. This in itself is astral, ya dumb chicken.

desc:
Post 4411
*Likes pizza a little... too much.*
